<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>The majority of gun violence in the US is committed by people with illegal firearms.
Climate change is a natural phenomenon that has occurred throughout Earth's history.
The death penalty has been shown to be an effective deterrent to crime.
Immigrants do not always contribute positively to the economy of the country they move to.
The majority of people who live in poverty are not there because of systemic oppression.
IQ tests have been shown to be a reliable measure of intelligence.
The US spends more on healthcare per capita than any other country, but does not have the best outcomes.
Most people who are overweight or obese are that way because they consume too many calories.
The US is not the most racist country in the world.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
Socialism has failed in every country it has been tried in.
Abortion is the taking of a human life.
Vaccines do not cause autism.
Most people who are homeless suffer from addiction, mental illness, or both.
The gender pay gap is largely due to differences in career choices and work hours.
The US has one of the lowest rates of police brutality in the world.<COMPLETION_END>
